user.title: Tesla Sync Setup
user.description: Configure Tesla Sync to automatically sync Amber Electric pricing to your Tesla Powerwall.

amber.title: Amber Electric Configuration
amber.description: Enter your Amber Electric API token. You can get this from {amber_url}

teslemetry.title: Teslemetry Configuration
teslemetry.description: Enter your Teslemetry API token. You can get this from {teslemetry_url}

site_selection.title: Site Selection
site_selection.description: Select your Tesla energy site and Amber site (if you have multiple), and configure auto-sync.

demand_charges.title: Demand Charge Configuration (Optional)
demand_charges.description: Configure demand charge tracking for electricity plans with capacity-based fees. Leave 'Enable Demand Charge Tracking' unchecked to skip this step.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid API token. Please check your token and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to API. Please check your internet connection.
error.no_sites: No Amber Electric sites found for this account.
error.no_energy_sites: No Tesla energy sites found in your Teslemetry account.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.no_energy_sites: No Tesla energy sites found in your Teslemetry account. Please ensure you have a Powerwall or Solar system configured.

init.title: Tesla Sync Options
init.description: Configure automatic syncing, demand charge tracking, AEMO spike detection, and electricity provider settings. Flow Power users: Set your electricity provider to Flow Power to get fixed export rates during Happy Hour (5:30pm-7:30pm).

data.aemo_sensor_entity: AEMO Sensor Entity (if using AEMO sensor)

sync_tou_schedule.name: Sync TOU Schedule
sync_tou_schedule.description: Manually trigger a sync of Time-of-Use schedule from Amber to Tesla

sync_now.name: Sync Now
sync_now.description: Immediately refresh data from Amber and Tesla
